channel.title: 10 on Mathematical Michael
channel.description: Recent content in 10 on Mathematical Michael

item.title: Random || Not Random # 351: Polygon
item.description: 70-sided polygon with vertices chosen from 7 distance(s) from the origin. $$ s = .00068800, \; $$ $$ | \lbrace \theta \rbrace | = 70, $$ $$ | \lbrace r \rbrace | = 7,$$ $$ r_0 = 0.2500,$$ $$ R = 1.00, $$ $$r \sim \beta(0.902, 1.305), $$ $$\theta \sim \beta(1.000, 1.000). $$
